org.grobid.core.lexicon

Class FastMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grobid.core.lexicon.FastMatcher

  • public final class FastMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for fast matching of word sequences over text stream.

      • matchToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchToken(java.lang.String text)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned.
        Parameters:
        text: - the text to be processed
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchToken(java.lang.String text,
                                                 boolean caseSensitive)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned.
        Parameters:
        text: - the text to be processed
        caseSensitive: - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchLayoutToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchLayoutToken(java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokens)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned. Here the input is a list of LayoutToken object.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the text to be processed as a list of LayoutToken objects
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchLayoutToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchLayoutToken(java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokens,
                                                       boolean ignoreDelimiters,
                                                       boolean caseSensitive)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned. Here the input is a list of LayoutToken object.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the text to be processed as a list of LayoutToken objects
        ignoreDelimiters - if true, ignore the delimiters in the matching process
        caseSensitive: - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchCharacter

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchCharacter(java.lang.String text)
        Gives the character positions within a text where matches occur.

        By iterating over the OffsetPosition and applying substring, we get all the matches.

        All the matches are returned.

        Parameters:
        text: - the text to be processed
        caseSensitive: - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches referred to the input string, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchCharacter

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchCharacter(java.lang.String text,
                                                     boolean caseSensitive)
        Gives the character positions within a text where matches occur.

        By iterating over the OffsetPosition and applying substring, we get all the matches.

        All the matches are returned.

        Parameters:
        text: - the text to be processed
        caseSensitive: - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches referred to the input string, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchCharacterLayoutToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchCharacterLayoutToken(java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokens)
        Gives the character positions within a tokenized text where matches occur.

        All the matches are returned.

        Parameters:
        tokens - the text to be processed as a list of LayoutToken objects
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches referred to the input string, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matchCharacterLayoutToken

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matchCharacterLayoutToken(java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokens,
                                                                boolean caseSensitive)
        Gives the character positions within a tokenized text where matches occur.

        All the matches are returned.

        Parameters:
        tokens - the text to be processed as a list of LayoutToken objects
        caseSensitive - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches referred to the input string, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matcherPairs

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matcherPairs(java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> tokens)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned. This case correspond to text from a trainer, where the text is already tokenized with some labeled that can be ignored.
        Parameters:
        tokens: - the text to be processed
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

      • matcherPairs

        public java.util.List<OffsetPosition> matcherPairs(java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> tokens,
                                                   boolean caseSensitive)
        Identify terms in a piece of text and gives corresponding token positions. All the matches are returned. This case correspond to text from a trainer, where the text is already tokenized with some labeled that can be ignored.
        Parameters:
        tokens: - the text to be processed
        caseSensitive: - ensure case sensitive matching or not
        Returns:
        the list of offset positions of the matches, an empty list if no match have been found

        Process token, if different than @newline
